br.octahedron.cotopaxi.view.formatter
Class Formatter

java.lang.Object
  br.octahedron.cotopaxi.view.formatter.Formatter
Direct Known Subclasses:
TemplateFormatter
public abstract class Formatter
extends Object

Formatters are responsible by formats the responses to be rendered to user.

Author:
Danilo Penna Queiroz - daniloqueiroz@octahedron.com.br

Constructor Detail

Formatter

public Formatter(ContentType contentType)
Method Detail

isReady

public boolean isReady()
Checks if this Formatterformatter is ready to be used. Be ready means that the locale and attributes was already set.

Returns:
true if it's ready, false otherwise.

getContentType

public ContentType getContentType()
                           throws IllegalStateException
Gets the response's content type

Throws:
IllegalStateException
See Also:
ContentType

getLocale

public Locale getLocale()
                 throws IllegalStateException
Gets the response's locale

setAttributes

public void setAttributes(Map<String,Object> atts)
Sets this formatter Attributes

Parameters:
atts - The attributes to be formatted

setLocale

public void setLocale(Locale lc)
Sets this formatter locale.

Parameters:
lc - the response locale

format

public final String format()
                    throws IllegalStateException
Formats the response. It's a template method, subclass should implements the doFormat() method.

Returns:
the formatted response as String.
Throws:
IllegalStateException

doFormat

protected abstract String doFormat()
Formats the content and return it as String. This method is called by the format() template method, that check if this format is ready before call it, thus when this method be called, all the formatter properties, such locale and attributes will be already set.

Returns:
